general_info.summary: This text provides a link to the Sharda University website, specifically to the program details for a Post-Basic B.Sc. Nursing degree.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths for graduates of a nursing program, including Nurse Manager, Critical Care Nurse, Paramedic Nurse, and Staff Nurse. It also highlights that students from this program typically receive an average annual salary package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Nurse Manager
• Critical Care Nurse
• Paramedic Nurse
• Staff Nurse
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
